function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variability of biocidal activity of graphene-based materials","category":"Chemical","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the long-term effectiveness of graphene-based surface coatings against sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of metal nanoparticles in high-performance coatings may pose a risk of environmental contamination and toxicity.","category":"Environmental","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risks associated with the use of graphene-based coatings for antiviral applications, including unknown long-term health effects and environmental impact.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to poor solubility and processing of graphene oxide go may hinder the fabrication of antimicrobial coatings.","category":"Chemical","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to graphene family materials with antiviral properties","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mechanism of action of gbns against viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gbns penetrating cell membrane for physical disruption and rupture","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Oxidative stress mechanism generating ros and damaging macromolecules of microorganisms","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear effect of physicochemical features of gbns on antibacterial activity","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited application reports and proof-of-concept scenarios","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Agglomeration problems with gbns","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for ineffective antimicrobial coatings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term effectiveness and sustainability of antimicrobial coatings","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential toxicity of graphene-based nano materials when used in antiviral applications","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accuracy, repeatability, and specificity challenges in detecting and preventing viruses using graphene-coated materials","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of complete assessment of cytotoxicity for antiviral materials","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of climate change projections in describing the risk of multiple vector-borne diseases","category":"Environmental","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clean water and sanitation leading to the presence of intestinal parasitic diseases","category":"Environmental","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Atypical climatic variations leading to rift valley fever and malaria epidemics in east site-specific interventions may not be scalable and applicable in different regions, leading to ineffective disease control shifts","category":"Environmental","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Re-emergence of the disease due to the completion of the three gorges dam","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Local adaptive capacity may not be sufficient to contain the spread of contagious diseases in diverse contexts.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of ensuring social distancing in
